message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a unique opportunity to purchase a rare and valuable item. I'm willing to sell it to you for $1500000. This is a fair price considering its exceptional quality and rarity. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the item you're selling, but my budget allows me to pay no more than $1200000 for it. Would you consider reducing the price?
